headline: Mamba Moves, On and Off Court
abstract: A complex figure both off court and on, the basketball star brought as much cerebral intensity to image creation as he did to his game.
lead_paragraph: Mamba power — with its chessboard strategies, gravity-defying stealth moves, Marvel Comics-levels of proprioception — played a role in most aspects of Kobe Bryant’s existence, so it is hardly surprising to learn that this also included fashion.
